channel.title: Shell on Hugo Grimoire
channel.description: Recent content in Shell on Hugo Grimoire

item.title: OpenAI Whisper
item.description: Whisper is a general-purpose speech recognition model. It is trained on a large dataset of diverse audio and is also a multi-task model that can perform multilingual speech recognition as well as speech translation and language identification.

item.title: net user
item.description: The "net user" command is a Command Prompt (Shell) command used to manage user accounts on a Windows operating system. It can be used to create, modify, or delete user accounts, as well as to change passwords and manage group memberships.

item.title: Mastering Time with Shell and PowerShell
item.description: Discover an array of shell and PowerShell commands related to time management, such as checking the last boot-up time, system boot time, and changing the time zone.
